objective: Confirm that the AAFR signal engine, indicator logic, and data flow all work correctly using mock or demo data before connecting to any live account.

modules_required: signal_dispatcher (Output handler for trade JSON and Telegram alerts)
environment.success_criteria: All modules import and initialize without error.

1_icc_structure_validation.description: Compare AAFR ICC-detected zones to manually marked chart zones.
steps: Manually label Indication, Correction, and Continuation zones on chart.
Run AAFR ICC scan on same mock dataset.

2_cvd_alignment_validation.description: Verify that CVD volume movement confirms ICC continuation points.
steps: Enable CVD overlay feed in the mock data module.
Visually verify that volume delta direction matches continuation phase.
Log divergence or alignment for each setup.
2_cvd_alignment_validation.success_criteria: CVD and price align at every continuation trigger.

3_risk_engine_validation.description: Simulate trades and verify position sizing, R-multiples, and trailing stop logic.
steps: Run simulated trade batch using risk engine.
Check trailing stop activates at +1 R and updates according to defined tiers.
3_risk_engine_validation.success_criteria: All calculations accurate; no trades exceed 1% risk.

4_signal_output_validation.description: Check JSON output formatting, timestamp precision, and latency.
steps: Generate trade signals through AAFR engine.
Inspect each signal's JSON structure for required fields: symbol, direction, entry, stop, tp, r_multiple, risk_dollar, timestamp.
Measure generation latency between signal trigger and log entry.

5_logging_and_storage_validation.description: Confirm all validation results are saved properly.
steps: Ensure all ICC, CVD, and trade validation logs exist with timestamps.
Confirm JSON, CSV, and console logs are consistent.
5_logging_and_storage_validation.success_criteria: All logs present and readable; filenames include validation date.

pass_conditions: All 5 test modules pass success criteria.
No errors in data flow or signal generation.
Risk, ICC, and CVD subsystems verified stable under mock data.
final_validation_summary.result: System ready for Day 3 – Multi-instrument backtesting and live signal integration.
